welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lebanon, where history, culture, and natural beauty come together to create a charming and unforgettable experience. Explore our vibrant city, known for its delicious cuisine, historic sites, and friendly locals, and make the most of your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lancaster Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrisburg International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Harrisburg International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Harrisburg International Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Capital City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Capital City Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport, serving all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
